channel.title: The Very First RuneScape - V1
channel.description:
[size=24pt]The Very First RuneScape[/size] [size=12pt]Current Version: V1[/size]
[b]Summary[/b] [i]I made this in my spare time, it's a text based game, the very first version of RuneScape :D. If you lack a sense of humor, please do not follow these instructions, I don't want flaming or spamming because all of my threads get locked when another person flames or spams. Follow the instructions below to begin playing the game :D.[/i]
[b]Instructions[/b] [i]Step One[/i] Copy and paste an existing .bat file, or make a new .bat file.
[i]Step Two[/i] Right click on the .bat file and select, "edit".
[i]Step Three[/i] Right click in the notepad of the .bat file and click, "select all".
[i]Step Four[/i] Hit the backspace button (deletes everything) and replace it with this code. [code] @echo off :startscreen title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo Welcome to the very first RuneScape! By Le Ltd. Please select echo an option below, and remember; at any time you may type echo 'exit' to exit the game. echo. echo A - Start the game. echo B - View the game origin. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== A goto gamestart if %c%== B goto gameorigin pause cls :gameorigin title Game Origin echo. echo Welcome, to the very first ever RuneScape! By Le Ltd echo (little to do(so we made this)). This is a text based game, which was echo the very first version of RuneScape! After much developement, Le sold the echo idea to Jagex Ltd because it was getting nowhere, but after Le saw what echo Jagex Ltd had done with the game, he was shocked. Jagex had developed an echo entire new game with the idea, RuneScape Classic! Le was shocked echo by the huge success, and was mad for selling the idea; but once the echo RuneScape we all Know and love came out, RuneScape 2, Le was furious with echo himself for selling the first version of RuneScape developed by Le Ltd. echo Le had put so much work into it, only to find it could have been a huge echo success with a little developement, and he could have been making millions echo of dollars with all the the $5 paying addicts. Le was so furious, that echo he set off to overcome Jagex Ltd and make a new RuneScape, a better echo RuneScape, but since they googled all the answers on moparscape echo quiz, this is all Le and Le Ltd could come up with. echo. echo Enter 'B' To return to the main menu. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== B goto startscreen pause :gamestart title Game Start echo. echo Hello, and welcome to the world of RuneScape. Please select a gender echo with the words 'male' or 'female'. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== male goto gamestart-male if %c%== female goto gamestart-female pause :gamestart-male title Welcome, Male echo. echo. Hello, Male. What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto welcomemale pause :gamestart-female title Welcome, Female echo. echo. Hello, Female, What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto :welcomefemale pause :welcomemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a male of RuneScape, your main goal is to snag the rare echo partyhat, and if your really lucky, the female. Females are scarce, echo 10 percent of RuneScape is a female, and 90 percent of that 10 percent echo is a male pretending to be a female, so watch out. Also, females can echo be very dangerous, known to have hit 90's with the lengendary bitch echo slap. They can also suck you dry quicker than a noob in Lumbridge echo when you're wearing full dragon. Your secondary goals are to avoid said echo noobs, as they will stick to you like a bad germ, and to become the echo strongest in the game, making wise choices and actually playing the game. echo Good luck. pause goto gamestart1 :welcomefemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a female of RuneScape, your main goal is to dig as much echo gold as you can from the pockets of males. Males will be warned of females, echo and their sometimes lack of the female parts. So be careful, they may be echo suspicious of you. Your secondary goals are to look as "prettifull" and echo "seksi" as you possibly can, and buy items for their looks instead echo of their bonuses. Good luck. pause goto gamestart1 :gamestart1 title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You spawn next to a guide, what do you do? echo. echo To talk to the man, enter 1. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1 if %c%== 2 goto 2 pause :1 title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo MAN: Hello, and welcome to RuneScape, please follow the road echo down and speak with the survival expert. echo. echo To follow the road, enter 1. echo To talk to the man, enter 2. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1a if %c%== 2 goto 2a if %c%== 3 goto 3 pause :2 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 2 pause :1a title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You walk down the path and see the lady echo. echo To talk to the lady, press 1. echo To brutaly murder the lady, press 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1b if %c%== 2 goto 2b pause :2a title The Very First RuneScape - By Le LTd. echo. echo MAN: Hello, and welcome to RuneScape, please follow the road echo down and speak with the survival expert. echo. echo To follow the road, enter 1. echo To talk to the man, enter 2. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1a if %c%== 2 goto 2a if %c%== 3 goto 3 pause :3 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 3 pause :1b title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo LADY: Here, take this fishing net and try to catch some echo shrimp from that fishing spot over there. echo. echo To go to the fishing spots and try to fish, enter 1. echo To say "Fuck no bitch", enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1c if %c%== 2 goto 2c pause :2b title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Retry?: if %c%== yes goto 2a if %c%== no goto 2b pause :1c title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You fish for shrimp...you catch one! echo. echo To fish for more shrimp, enter 1. echo To talk to the lady again, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1c if %c%== 2 goto 1f :2c title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo YOU: Fuck no bitch, you go fish them. echo LADY: Oooooh Mr. Leeeee. goto 1d pause :1d title Oops! echo. echo You have been banned. echo. echo To restart, enter 1. echo To argue the ban, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto gamestart if %c%== 2 goto 1e pause :1f title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo LADY: Here's a tinderbox and an axe, chop down the tree and echo then try to cook the fish. echo. echo To cut down a tree, enter 1. echo To fish for more shrimp, enter 2. echo To talk say "Fuck no bitch", enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1g if %c%== 2 goto 1c if %c%== 3 goto 2c pause :1e title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You sent a message to Le. Success! Ban lifted. pause goto 1b :1g title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You cut logs from the tree. echo. echo To light the logs on fire with the tinderbox, enter 1. echo To throw the stuff in the river for no apparent reason, enter 2. echo To chop your head off with frustration of this piece of shit game, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1h if %c%== 2 goto 2d if %c%== 3 goto 3b pause :3b title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :2d title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo Well that did no good? Go talk to the lady again. pause goto 1f :1h title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You light the logs on fire. echo. echo To cook the shrimp on the fire, enter 1. echo To cook yourself on the fire enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1i if %c%== 2 goto 2e pause :1i title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You cook the shrimp. echo. echo To talk to the lady, enter 1. echo To test the theory "fire is hot", enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto lj if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2e title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :lj title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo Lady: Congratulations, you may now move on. echo. echo To move on down the road, enter 1. echo To tell the lady you love her and want to stay, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1k if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :1k title Congratulations! echo. echo Congratulations! You've beaten The Very First RuneScape V1 - more versions to come! pause [/code]
[b]More Versions To Come![/b] [i]This is my side project, because coding my server gets tedius, so making this is like a break. Keep coming back and following the instructions to get the latest version, and by the way, the game is most funny if you try all the routes. Enjoy.[/i]

item.title: The Very First RuneScape - V1
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

Le, you should have added cls (i think thats what it is) at the end of each bit of code so that it’s not so messy. You should have also added

if %c%== * goto error

And added an error screen

This stops you from being able to press enter and go thought the game quick.

I hope these suggestions help you in your quest to dominate runescape. Lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

heres one i made:

@echo off :startscreen title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo Welcome to the very first RuneScape! By Le Ltd. Please select echo an option below, and remember; at any time you may type echo 'exit' to exit the game. echo. echo A - Start the game. echo B - View the game origin. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== A goto gamestart if %c%== B goto gameorigin pause cls :gameorigin title Game Origin echo. echo Welcome, to the very first ever RuneScape! By Le Ltd echo (little to do(so we made this)). This is a text based game, which was echo the very first version of RuneScape! After much developement, Le sold the echo idea to Jagex Ltd because it was getting nowhere, but after Le saw what echo Jagex Ltd had done with the game, he was shocked. Jagex had developed an echo entire new game with the idea, RuneScape Classic! Le was shocked echo by the huge success, and was mad for selling the idea; but once the echo RuneScape we all Know and love came out, RuneScape 2, Le was furious with echo himself for selling the first version of RuneScape developed by Le Ltd. echo Le had put so much work into it, only to find it could have been a huge echo success with a little developement, and he could have been making millions echo of dollars with all the the $5 paying addicts. Le was so furious, that echo he set off to overcome Jagex Ltd and make a new RuneScape, a better echo RuneScape, but since they googled all the answers on moparscape echo quiz, this is all Le and Le Ltd could come up with. echo. echo Enter 'B' To return to the main menu. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== B goto startscreen pause :gamestart title Game Start echo. echo Hello, and welcome to the world of RuneScape. Please select a gender echo with the words 'male' or 'female'. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== male goto gamestart-male if %c%== female goto gamestart-female pause :gamestart-male title Welcome, Male echo. echo. Hello, Male. What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto welcomemale pause :gamestart-female title Welcome, Female echo. echo. Hello, Female, What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto :welcomefemale pause :welcomemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a male of RuneScape, your main goal is to snag the rare echo partyhat, and if your really lucky, the female. Females are scarce, echo 10 percent of RuneScape is a female, and 90 percent of that 10 percent echo is a male pretending to be a female, so watch out. Also, females can echo be very dangerous, known to have hit 90's with the lengendary bitch echo slap. They can also suck you dry quicker than a noob in Lumbridge echo when you're wearing full dragon. Your secondary goals are to avoid said echo noobs, as they will stick to you like a bad germ, and to become the echo strongest in the game, making wise choices and actually playing the game. echo Good luck. pause goto gamestart1 :welcomefemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a female of RuneScape, your main goal is to dig as much echo gold as you can from the pockets of males. Males will be warned of females, echo and their sometimes lack of the female parts. So be careful, they may be echo suspicious of you. Your secondary goals are to look as "prettifull" and echo "seksi" as you possibly can, and buy items for their looks instead echo of their bonuses. Good luck. pause goto gamestart1 :gamestart1 title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You spawn next to a guide, what do you do? echo. echo To talk to the man, enter 1. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1 if %c%== 2 goto 2 pause :1 title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo MAN: Hello, and welcome to RuneScape, please follow the road echo down and speak with the survival expert. echo. echo To follow the road, enter 1. echo To talk to the man, enter 2. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1a if %c%== 2 goto 2a if %c%== 3 goto 3 pause :2 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 2 pause :1a title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You walk down the path and see the lady echo. echo To talk to the lady, press 1. echo To brutaly murder the lady, press 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1b if %c%== 2 goto 2b pause :2a title The Very First RuneScape - By Le LTd. echo. echo MAN: Hello, and welcome to RuneScape, please follow the road echo down and speak with the survival expert. echo. echo To follow the road, enter 1. echo To talk to the man, enter 2. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1a if %c%== 2 goto 2a if %c%== 3 goto 3 pause :3 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 3 pause :1b title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo LADY: Here, take this fishing net and try to catch some echo shrimp from that fishing spot over there. echo. echo To go to the fishing spots and try to fish, enter 1. echo To say "Fuck no bitch", enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1c if %c%== 2 goto 2c pause :2b title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Retry?: if %c%== yes goto 2a if %c%== no goto 2b pause :1c title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You fish for shrimp...you catch one! echo. echo To fish for more shrimp, enter 1. echo To talk to the lady again, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1c if %c%== 2 goto 1f :2c title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo YOU: Fuck no bitch, you go fish them. echo LADY: Oooooh Mr. Leeeee. goto 1d pause :1d title Oops! echo. echo You have been banned. echo. echo To restart, enter 1. echo To argue the ban, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto gamestart if %c%== 2 goto 1e pause :1f title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo LADY: Here's a tinderbox and an axe, chop down the tree and echo then try to cook the fish. echo. echo To cut down a tree, enter 1. echo To fish for more shrimp, enter 2. echo To talk say "Fuck no bitch", enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1g if %c%== 2 goto 1c if %c%== 3 goto 2c pause :1e title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You sent a message to Le. Success! Ban lifted. pause goto 1b :1g title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You cut logs from the tree. echo. echo To light the logs on fire with the tinderbox, enter 1. echo To throw the stuff in the river for no apparent reason, enter 2. echo To chop your head off with frustration of this piece of shit game, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1h if %c%== 2 goto 2d if %c%== 3 goto 3b pause :3b title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :2d title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo Well that did no good? Go talk to the lady again. pause goto 1f :1h title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You light the logs on fire. echo. echo To cook the shrimp on the fire, enter 1. echo To cook yourself on the fire enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1i if %c%== 2 goto 2e pause :1i title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You cook the shrimp. echo. echo To talk to the lady, enter 1. echo To test the theory "fire is hot", enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto lj if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2e title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :lj title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo Lady: Congratulations, you may now move on. echo. echo To move on down the road, enter 1. echo To tell the lady you love her and want to stay, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1k if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :1k title Congratulations! echo. title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo you come up to an abandoned apartment complex in nyc echo. echo To go into it and live there enter 1 echo To kill yourself enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 9o if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :9o title in the apartment.... echo. echo you go into the apartment to find an old bum and his dog echo to kill the bum and steal his dog enter 1 echo to talk to the bum and set-up some living conditions enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 5r if %c%== 2 goto 4t :4t title you dumbass he cut you up like a whitey echo. echo You got killed bitch! pause goto gamestart :5r title in the apartment.... echo. echo you kill him steal his dog and this apartment is now yours! echo to go out and start training woodcutting enter 1 echo to stay here for awhile and play with the dog enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 9q if %c%== 2 goto 6y pause :6y title dog killz echo. echo you played witht he dog and got killed pause goto gamestart :9q title in the apartment.... echo you go outside and get your woodcutting level up to 60 echo to go sell your logs and use the money to buy a house enter 1 echo to level up firemaking enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 9w if %c%== 2 goto 6t pause :6t title fire is hot echo. echo you level up fire making a bit and get bored so you kill yourself pause goto gamestart :9w title house echo you sell your logs and buy a nice house to live in echo you now see a person walking by your house do you echo run out with a sword and fuck them up enter 1 echo run out with a gun and pop a cap in their ass enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 10w if %c%== 2 goto 7t pause pause :7t title goner! echo. echo you look around find your gun as your about to shot you miss and the echo bullet comes back on you ! you idiot pause goto gamestart :10w title the fight echo. echo you go out with your sword and trip on a little rock and make a fool out of yourself echo you then look around at the noobs and think of killing them with your mini shotgun that echo isn't even made yet but you somehow got it do you echo use your sword again enter 1 echo use your mini shotgun enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 8t if %c%== 2 goto 11w pause pause :8t title BANNED echo. echo you pull out your sword and run at the person then a admin comes echo 'your banned for trying to attack a non-attackable npc'. pause goto gamestart :11w title MOD echo. echo you pull out your mini shotgun and shot everyone that comes near you or who echo laugh at you an admin comes and you shot him to lucky le hated that admin and made you mod! =D echo now you can go around as a mod and your only level 3! =O echo to go train enter 1 echo to go to the wild enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 12w if %c%== 2 goto 9t pause pause :9t title NO MOD AND PERM MUTED echo. echo you go to wild and die and le laughs at you and echo you lose mod and get perm muted ! pause goto gamestart :12w title LEVEL 75 :O echo. echo you go train and get to level 75 ! echo this is the end of iraklis123's version of this game. echo. pause

Read full topic

item.title: The Very First RuneScape - V1
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Wildcat_240:

The beggining sounds Kind of Sexist don’t you think? I guess the game’s ok

Yes I agree with you there, the game does sound a bit sexist, but its the cold truth of RuneScape. 90% of girl players in rs are actually guys…ugh…one good reason to switch to private servers…less…“gender confusion”? lol. Nice I might add on a bit myself… ;D

Read full topic
